customer_message: Hi, I'm Nick. I shifted to a new place last week 11,Windsor Ln, Houston. Please update this in the system because my delivery was sent to the old address again.

Email sarah.smith@abcdefg.com if further details are needed. Also, my alternate mail sarah_alt@xyzabcd.com can be used during weekends.

Contact my assistant at +1-123-456-6789. She handles all my bookings because I travel frequently between Singapore and LA.
